sqlMap.statement: LOAD TABLE ftbStatMonthBscGprsSpaceUsers ( intBscId, intYear , intMonth , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$

LOAD TABLE ftbStatMonthApnUserBelongUsers ( intUserBelongId,intApnTypeId,intApnId, intYear , intMonth , nmUsers, dtStatTime, intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$
LOAD TABLE ftbStatMonthGprsBussUsers ( nmBussinessId, intYear , intMonth , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP) $option$

insert into ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush ( intYear , intMonth , nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,nmLocalUsers) select intYear,intMonth,count(distinct(nmImsi)),getdate(),intRaitype ,count(distinct(case when intUserBelongId=1 then nmimsi else 0 end)) from ftbStatApnUserHourUsers_week where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) group by intYear,intMonth,intRaitype;

update ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush set nmAppUpFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppUpFlush) from ftbStatWeekGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmAppDownFlush = (select sum(h.nmAppDownFlush) from ftbStatWeekGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmFlush =(select sum(h.nmFlush) from ftbStatWeekGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ), nmLocalFlush =(select sum(h.nmLocalFlush) from ftbStatWeekGprsTotalFlush h where ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intYear = h.intYear and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intMonth = h.intMonth and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intRaitype = h.intRaitype ) where ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush.intMonth =datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#);
delete from ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush where intYear = datepart(yy,#dtLoadedTime#) and intMonth = datepart(mm,#dtLoadedTime#) and vcLocalIP is null
LOAD TABLE ftbStatMonthGprsTotalFlush ( intYear,intMonth,nmUsers, dtStatTime,intRaitype,vcLocalIP ) $option$
